newsitem.title: USA: Vickers plans South Carolina pump plant.
newsitem.headline: Vickers plans South Carolina pump plant.

text.p: Aeroquip-Vickers Inc. said Thursday its Vickers Inc. subsidiary plans to open a plant in Greenwood, S.C., to produce a new range of piston pumps.
The facility will have 85 employees initially and up to 200 when full production is reached in five years.
The company, made up of Aeroquip Corp. and Vickers Inc., did not disclose the size of the investment.
Vickers is purchasing an existing plant that will have about 112,000 square feet of manufacturing capacity after it is renovated, the company said.
The company said it will export a significant portion of the facility's output to Europe and the Asia-Pacific region.
Product assembly will begin in June, with machining operations expected to start in September, Vickers said.
The Maumee, Ohio-based company's stock rose 12.5 cents to $41.75 on the New York Stock Exchange at mid-afternoon.
